00042 //! class Eval_Centre_VDF_Face<br>Evaluateur VDF pour la convection<br>Le champ convecte est un Champ_Face<br>Schema de convection Centre<br>Rq:Les evaluateurs de flux convectifs calculent en fait le terme<br>convectif qui figure au second membre de l'equation d'evolution<br>c.a.d l'oppose du flux convectif<br>Rq:Pour les bords, le calcul se fait avec le schema Amont.
00043 /** \sa Eval_Conv_VDF */
00044 
00045

00195 // Fonctions de calcul de flux pour une inconnue scalaire
00196 
00197 ////!< flux_arete_fluide 
00198 //
00199 
00200 
00201 inline void Eval_Centre_VDF_Face::flux_arete_fluide(const DoubleTab& inco,
00202                                                     int fac1, int fac2,
00203                                                     int fac3, int signe,
00204                                                     double& flux3, double& flux1_2) const
00205 {
00206   double flux,psc;
00207 
00208 // Calcul de flux3:
00209 
00210   psc = 0.25 * ((dt_vitesse[fac1]*porosite[fac1]    +
00211                  dt_vitesse[fac2]*porosite[fac2] )  *
00212                 (surface(fac1) + surface(fac2))  );
00213 
00214   if ((psc*signe)>0)
00215     flux=inco[fac3]*psc ;
00216   else
00217     {
00218 
00219       int rang1 = (fac1-premiere_face_bord);
00220       int rang2 = (fac2-premiere_face_bord);
00221       int ori = orientation(fac3);
00222       flux = 0.5*(Champ_Face_get_val_imp_face_bord(inconnue->temps(),rang1,ori,la_zcl)
00223                   +  Champ_Face_get_val_imp_face_bord(inconnue->temps(),rang2,ori,la_zcl))* psc ;
00224     }
00225 
00226   flux3 =  -flux;
00227 
00228 // Calcul de flux1_2:
00229 
00230   psc = 0.5*dt_vitesse(fac3)*surface(fac3)*porosite(fac3);
00231 
00232   if (psc>0)
00233     flux = psc*inco[fac1];
00234   else
00235 
00236     flux = psc*0.5*(inco[fac1]+inco[fac2]);
00237 
00238   flux1_2 = -flux;
00239 }
00240 
00241 
00242 ////!< flux_arete_interne 
00243 //
00244 
00245 inline double Eval_Centre_VDF_Face::flux_arete_interne(const DoubleTab& inco ,
00246                                                        int fac1, int fac2,
00247                                                        int fac3, int fac4) const
00248 {
00249   double flux;
00250   double psc = 0.25 * ( dt_vitesse[fac1]*porosite[fac1] +
00251                         dt_vitesse[fac2]*porosite[fac2] ) *
00252                ( surface[fac1] + surface[fac2] );
00253 
00254   flux = 0.5*(inco[fac3]+inco[fac4])*psc ;
00255 
00256   return -flux;
00257 }
00258 
00259 
00260 ////!< flux_arete_mixte 
00261 //
00262 
00263 inline double Eval_Centre_VDF_Face::flux_arete_mixte(const DoubleTab& inco ,
00264                                                      int fac1, int fac2,
00265                                                      int fac3, int fac4) const
00266 {
00267   double flux;
00268   double psc = 0.25 * ( dt_vitesse[fac1]*porosite[fac1] +
00269                         dt_vitesse[fac2]*porosite[fac2] ) *
00270                ( surface[fac1] + surface[fac2] );
00271 
00272   flux = psc*0.5*(inco[fac3]+inco[fac4]);
00273 
00274   return -flux;
00275 }

00287 ////!< flux_arete_paroi_fluide 
00288 //
00289 
00290 inline void Eval_Centre_VDF_Face::flux_arete_paroi_fluide(const DoubleTab& inco,
00291                                                           int fac1, int fac2,
00292                                                           int fac3, int signe,
00293                                                           double& flux3 , double& flux1_2) const
00294 {
00295   double psc,flux;
00296   psc = 0.25 * ((dt_vitesse[fac1]*porosite[fac1]    +
00297                  dt_vitesse[fac2]*porosite[fac2] )  *
00298                 (surface(fac1) + surface(fac2))  );
00299 
00300   if ((psc*signe)>0)
00301     flux=inco[fac3]*psc ;
00302   else
00303     {
00304       int rang1 = (fac1-premiere_face_bord);
00305       int rang2 = (fac2-premiere_face_bord);
00306       int ori = orientation(fac3);
00307       flux = 0.5*(Champ_Face_get_val_imp_face_bord(inconnue->temps(),rang1,ori,la_zcl)
00308                   +  Champ_Face_get_val_imp_face_bord(inconnue->temps(),rang2,ori,la_zcl))* psc ;
00309     }
00310   flux3 = -flux;
00311 
00312 // Calcul de flux1_2:
00313 
00314   psc = 0.5*dt_vitesse(fac3)*surface(fac3)*porosite(fac3);
00315   if (psc>0)
00316     flux = psc*inco[fac1];
00317   else
00318     flux = psc*0.5*(inco[fac1]+inco[fac2]);
00319 
00320   flux1_2 = -flux;
00321 }
00322 
00323 ////!< flux_arete_periodicite 
00324 //
00325 
00326 void Eval_Centre_VDF_Face::flux_arete_periodicite(const DoubleTab& inco,
00327                                                   int fac1, int fac2,
00328                                                   int fac3, int fac4,
00329                                                   double& flux3_4 , double& flux1_2) const
00330 {
00331   double flux;
00332   double psc;
00333 
00334 // On calcule le flux convectif entre les volumes de controle associes a fac3 et fac4:
00335 
00336   psc = 0.25 * ( dt_vitesse[fac1]*porosite[fac1] +
00337                  dt_vitesse[fac2]*porosite[fac2] ) *
00338         ( surface[fac1] + surface[fac2] );
00339 
00340   flux = psc*0.5*(inco[fac3]+inco[fac4]);
00341 
00342   flux3_4 = -flux;
00343 
00344 // On calcule le flux convectif entre les volumes de controle associes a fac1 et fac2:
00345 
00346   psc = 0.25 * ( dt_vitesse[fac3]*porosite[fac3] +
00347                  dt_vitesse[fac4]*porosite[fac4] ) *
00348         ( surface[fac3] + surface[fac4] );
00349 
00350   flux = psc*0.5*(inco[fac1]+inco[fac2]);
00351 
00352   flux1_2 = -flux;
00353 
00354 }
00355

00360 {

00364 
00365 ////!< flux_fa7_elem 
00366 //
00367 
00368 inline double Eval_Centre_VDF_Face::flux_fa7_elem(const DoubleTab& inco, int ,
00369                                                   int fac1, int fac2) const
00370 {
00371   double flux;
00372   double psc = 0.25 * (dt_vitesse[fac1]+dt_vitesse[fac2]) *
00373                (surface[fac1]+surface[fac2]);
00374   flux = psc * 0.5*(inco[fac1]*porosite[fac1]+inco[fac2]*porosite[fac2]);
00375 
00376   return -flux;
00377 }
00378 
00379 ////!< flux_fa7_sortie_libre 
00380 //
00381 
00382 inline double Eval_Centre_VDF_Face::flux_fa7_sortie_libre(const DoubleTab& inco, int face,
00383                                                           const Neumann_sortie_libre& la_cl,
00384                                                           int num1) const
00385 {
00386   double flux;
00387   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face);
00388   int elem1 = elem_(face,0);
00389 
00390 // ce qui est fait en Amont
00391   if (elem1 != -1)
00392     if (psc > 0)
00393       flux = psc*inco[face]*porosite[face];
00394     else
00395       flux = psc*la_cl.val_ext(face-num1,orientation(face));
00396   else //!< (elem2 != -1)
00397     if (psc < 0)
00398       flux = psc*inco[face]*porosite[face];
00399     else
00400       flux = psc*la_cl.val_ext(face-num1,orientation(face));
00401   return -flux;
00402 }
00403 
00404 ////!< flux_arete_symetrie_fluide 
00405 //
00406 inline void Eval_Centre_VDF_Face::flux_arete_symetrie_fluide(const DoubleTab& inco,
00407                                                              int fac1, int fac2,
00408                                                              int fac3, int signe,
00409                                                              double& flux3, double& flux1_2) const
00410 {
00411   double flux,psc;
00412 
00413 // Calcul de flux3:
00414 
00415   psc = 0.25 * ((dt_vitesse[fac1]*porosite[fac1]    +
00416                  dt_vitesse[fac2]*porosite[fac2] )  *
00417                 (surface(fac1) + surface(fac2))  );
00418 
00419   if ((psc*signe)>0)
00420     flux=inco[fac3]*psc ;
00421   else
00422     {
00423 
00424       int rang1 = (fac1-premiere_face_bord);
00425       int rang2 = (fac2-premiere_face_bord);
00426       int ori = orientation(fac3);
00427       flux = 0.5*(Champ_Face_get_val_imp_face_bord_sym(inco,inconnue->temps(),rang1,ori,la_zcl)
00428                   +  Champ_Face_get_val_imp_face_bord_sym(inco,inconnue->temps(),rang2,ori,la_zcl))* psc ;
00429     }
00430 
00431   flux3 =  -flux;
00432 
00433 // Calcul de flux1_2:
00434 
00435   psc = 0.5*dt_vitesse(fac3)*surface(fac3)*porosite(fac3);
00436 
00437   if (psc>0)
00438     flux = psc*inco[fac1];
00439   else
00440 
00441     flux = psc*0.5*(inco[fac1]+inco[fac2]);
00442 
00443   flux1_2 = -flux;
00444 }
00445 
00446 ////!< flux_arete_symetrie_paroi 
00447 //

00450 {
00451   return 0;

00453 
00454 // Fonctions de calcul de flux pour une inconnue vectorielle
00455 
00456 ////!< flux_arete_fluide 
00457 //
00458 
00459 inline void Eval_Centre_VDF_Face::flux_arete_fluide(const DoubleTab& inco,int fac1,
00460                                                     int fac2, int fac3, int signe,
00461                                                     DoubleVect& flux3, DoubleVect& flux1_2) const
00462 {
00463   int k;
00464   double psc = 0.25 * ((dt_vitesse[fac1]*porosite[fac1]    +
00465                         dt_vitesse[fac2]*porosite[fac2] )  *
00466                        (surface(fac1) + surface(fac2))  );
00467 
00468   if ((psc*signe)>0)
00469     for (k=0; k<flux3.size(); k++)
00470       flux3(k) = -inco(fac3,k)*psc ;
00471   else
00472     {
00473       int rang1 = (fac1-premiere_face_bord);
00474       int rang2 = (fac2-premiere_face_bord);
00475       int ori = orientation(fac3);
00476       for (k=0; k<flux3.size(); k++)
00477         flux3(k) = -0.5*(Champ_Face_get_val_imp_face_bord(inconnue->temps(),rang1,k,ori,la_zcl)
00478                          +  Champ_Face_get_val_imp_face_bord(inconnue->temps(),rang2,k,ori,la_zcl))* psc ;
00479     }
00480 
00481 // Calcul de flux1_2:
00482 
00483   psc = 0.5*dt_vitesse(fac3)*surface(fac3)*porosite(fac3);
00484   if (psc>0)
00485     for (k=0; k<flux1_2.size(); k++)
00486       flux1_2(k) = -psc*inco(fac1,k);
00487   else
00488     for (k=0; k<flux1_2.size(); k++)
00489       flux1_2(k) = -psc*inco(fac2,k);
00490 
00491 }
00492 
00493 
00494 ////!< flux_arete_interne 
00495 //
00496 
00497 inline void Eval_Centre_VDF_Face::flux_arete_interne(const DoubleTab& inco,int fac1,
00498                                                      int fac2,int fac3, int fac4,
00499                                                      DoubleVect& flux) const
00500 {
00501   int k;
00502   double psc = 0.25 * ( dt_vitesse[fac1]*porosite[fac1] +
00503                         dt_vitesse[fac2]*porosite[fac2] ) *
00504                ( surface[fac1] + surface[fac2] );
00505   for (k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
00506     flux(k) = -psc*0.5*(inco(fac3,k)+inco(fac4,k));
00507 }
00508 
00509 
00510 ////!< flux_arete_mixte 
00511 //
00512 
00513 inline void Eval_Centre_VDF_Face::flux_arete_mixte(const DoubleTab& inco,int fac1,
00514                                                    int fac2,int fac3, int fac4,
00515                                                    DoubleVect& flux) const
00516 {
00517   int k;
00518   double psc = 0.25 * ( dt_vitesse[fac1]*porosite[fac1] +
00519                         dt_vitesse[fac2]*porosite[fac2] ) *
00520                ( surface[fac1] + surface[fac2] );
00521 
00522   for (k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
00523     flux(k) = -psc*0.5*(inco(fac3,k)+inco(fac4,k));
00524 }

00537 
00538 ////!< flux_arete_paroi_fluide 
00539 //
00540 
00541 inline void Eval_Centre_VDF_Face::flux_arete_paroi_fluide(const DoubleTab& inco,int fac1,
00542                                                           int fac2,int fac3,int signe,
00543                                                           DoubleVect& flux3,DoubleVect& flux1_2) const
00544 {
00545   int k;
00546   double psc = 0.25 * ((dt_vitesse[fac1]*porosite[fac1]    +
00547                         dt_vitesse[fac2]*porosite[fac2] )  *
00548                        (surface(fac1) + surface(fac2))  );
00549 
00550   if ((psc*signe)>0)
00551     for (k=0; k<flux3.size(); k++)
00552       flux3(k) = -inco(fac3,k)*psc ;
00553   else
00554     {
00555       int rang1 = (fac1-premiere_face_bord);
00556       int rang2 = (fac2-premiere_face_bord);
00557       int ori = orientation(fac3);
00558       for (k=0; k<flux3.size(); k++)
00559         flux3(k) = -0.5*(Champ_Face_get_val_imp_face_bord(inconnue->temps(),rang1,k,ori,la_zcl)
00560                          +  Champ_Face_get_val_imp_face_bord(inconnue->temps(),rang2,k,ori,la_zcl))* psc ;
00561     }
00562 
00563 // Calcul de flux1_2:
00564 
00565   psc = 0.5*dt_vitesse(fac3)*surface(fac3)*porosite(fac3);
00566   if (psc>0)
00567     for (k=0; k<flux1_2.size(); k++)
00568       flux1_2(k) = -psc*inco(fac1,k);
00569   else
00570     for (k=0; k<flux1_2.size(); k++)
00571       flux1_2(k) = -psc*inco(fac2,k);
00572 
00573 }
00574 
00575 ////!< flux_arete_periodicite 
00576 //
00577 
00578 inline void Eval_Centre_VDF_Face::flux_arete_periodicite(const DoubleTab& inco,
00579                                                          int fac1, int fac2 , int fac3, int fac4,
00580                                                          DoubleVect& flux3_4, DoubleVect& flux1_2) const
00581 {
00582   double psc;
00583   int k;
00584 
00585 // On calcule le flux convectif entre les volumes de controle associes a fac3 et fac4:
00586 
00587   psc = 0.25 * ( dt_vitesse[fac1]*porosite[fac1] +
00588                  dt_vitesse[fac2]*porosite[fac2] ) *
00589         ( surface[fac1] + surface[fac2] );
00590 
00591   for (k=0; k<flux3_4.size(); k++)
00592     flux3_4(k) = -psc*0.5*(inco(fac3,k)+inco(fac4,k));
00593 
00594 
00595 // On calcule le flux convectifs entre les volumes de controle associes a fac1 et fac2:
00596 
00597   psc = 0.25 * ( dt_vitesse[fac3]*porosite[fac3] +
00598                  dt_vitesse[fac4]*porosite[fac4] ) *
00599         ( surface[fac3] + surface[fac4] );
00600 
00601   for (k=0; k<flux1_2.size(); k++)
00602     flux1_2(k) = -psc*0.5*(inco(fac1,k)+inco(fac2,k));
00603 }
00604

00606 //
00607 
00608 inline void Eval_Centre_VDF_Face::flux_arete_symetrie(const DoubleTab&, int,
00609                                                       int, int, int, DoubleVect& ) const
00610 {
00611   ;
00612 }

00614 
00615 ////!< flux_fa7_elem 
00616 //
00617 
00618 inline void Eval_Centre_VDF_Face::flux_fa7_elem(const DoubleTab& inco, int ,
00619                                                 int fac1, int fac2,
00620                                                 DoubleVect& flux) const
00621 {
00622   int k;
00623   double psc = 0.25 * (dt_vitesse[fac1]+dt_vitesse[fac2])*
00624                (surface[fac1]+surface[fac2]);
00625   if (psc>0)
00626     for (k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
00627       flux(k) = -psc*0.5*(inco(fac1,k)*porosite[fac1]+inco(fac2,k)*porosite[fac2]);
00628 }
00629 
00630 ////!< flux_fa7_sortie_libre 
00631 //
00632 
00633 inline void Eval_Centre_VDF_Face::flux_fa7_sortie_libre(const DoubleTab& inco, int face,
00634                                                         const Neumann_sortie_libre& la_cl,
00635                                                         int num1,DoubleVect& flux) const
00636 {
00637   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face);
00638   int elem1 = elem_(face,0);
00639   int k;
00640   if (elem1 != -1)
00641     if (psc > 0)
00642       for (k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
00643         flux(k) = -psc*inco(face,k)*porosite[face];
00644     else
00645       for (k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
00646         flux(k) = -psc*la_cl.val_ext(face-num1,k);
00647   else //!< (elem2 != -1)
00648     if (psc < 0)
00649       for (k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
00650         flux(k) = -psc*inco(face,k)*porosite[face];
00651     else
00652       for (k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
00653         flux(k) = -psc*la_cl.val_ext(face-num1,k);
00654 }
00655 
00656 ////!< flux_arete_symetrie_fluide 
00657 //
00658 
00659 inline void Eval_Centre_VDF_Face::flux_arete_symetrie_fluide(const DoubleTab& inco,int fac1,
00660                                                              int fac2, int fac3, int signe,
00661                                                              DoubleVect& flux3, DoubleVect& flux1_2) const
00662 {
00663   int k;
00664   double psc = 0.25 * ((dt_vitesse[fac1]*porosite[fac1]    +
00665                         dt_vitesse[fac2]*porosite[fac2] )  *
00666                        (surface(fac1) + surface(fac2))  );
00667 
00668   if ((psc*signe)>0)
00669     for (k=0; k<flux3.size(); k++)
00670       flux3(k) = -inco(fac3,k)*psc ;
00671   else
00672     {
00673       int rang1 = (fac1-premiere_face_bord);
00674       int rang2 = (fac2-premiere_face_bord);
00675       int ori = orientation(fac3);
00676       for (k=0; k<flux3.size(); k++)
00677         flux3(k) = -0.5*(Champ_Face_get_val_imp_face_bord(inconnue->temps(),rang1,k,ori,la_zcl)
00678                          +  Champ_Face_get_val_imp_face_bord(inconnue->temps(),rang2,k,ori,la_zcl))* psc ;
00679     }
00680 
00681 // Calcul de flux1_2:
00682 
00683   psc = 0.5*dt_vitesse(fac3)*surface(fac3)*porosite(fac3);
00684   if (psc>0)
00685     for (k=0; k<flux1_2.size(); k++)
00686       flux1_2(k) = -psc*inco(fac1,k);
00687   else
00688     for (k=0; k<flux1_2.size(); k++)
00689       flux1_2(k) = -psc*inco(fac2,k);
00690 
00691 }
